casebody.data:
ANDERSON v. NORTH CAROLINA DEPT. OF TRANSP. No. COA05-80. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed December 20, 2005. Certification Date January 9, 2006. Appeal from NC Industrial Commission (I.C. #14208, I.C. #977407, I.C. #983955)

Case without published opinion. Affirmed in part, remanded in part.
